wikitext.*:
'''SKŪ''' and '''KHŪ''' are [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|roots]] signifying "curse".<ref name=Eldarin>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 149 (roots appearing as "SKŪ-, KHŪ-")</ref>

The root of opposite meaning is [[AYA]].<ref name=Eldarin/>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''hūna'' ("cursed, accursed"); ''húta'' ("to curse")<ref name=Eldarin/>
